Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 30; full colour vignette; red and yellow borders. Spell 125 (start) and vignette.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 98. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 83, 100, fig. 59.
